PropertyBag.Description: Defines a column of a custom entity The class was an inheritor of Entity class. Inheritation was removed. EntityId, Name and Description propertes were copied from Entity class
PropertyBag.Name: EntityTypeColumn

Property.Description: Name of this entity. This is a collection of key-value pairs where the key indicates the language code, and the value contains the name in that language. Language codes in Metanga are based on IETF language tags. For example: "en-us", "ja-jp". Valid values can be found in Metanga, under Configuration -> Languages To Support (see the Culture Code column).
Property.Name: Name

Property.Description: Description of this entity. This is a collection of key-value pairs where the key indicates the language code, and the value contains the name in that language. Language codes in Metanga are based on IETF language tags. For example: "en-us", "ja-jp". Valid values can be found in Metanga, under Configuration -> Languages To Support (see the Culture Code column).
Property.Name: Description

Property.Description: The type of value that can be stored in this column. For example: string, number, boolean, etc.
Property.Name: DataType

Property.Description: The name of the property for purposes of external web services.
Property.Name: PropertyName

Property.Description: Data Type Configuration of the entity object
Property.Name: DataTypeConfiguration
